targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, server_addr, operation, status) (rate(hgraber_next_http_server_handle_duration_bucket{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$__rate_interval])))

(sum by (server_addr, operation, status) (hgraber_next_http_server_handle_duration_sum{service_name=~"$service_name"})) / (sum by (server_addr, operation, status) (hgraber_next_http_server_handle_duration_count{service_name=~"$service_name"}))
